metadata.feature_description: Soft delete and permanently delete posts from the activity stream

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Stream on Community page
steps.expected: Activity Stream with posts is visible
steps.actual: Activity Stream displayed with test post visible

steps.action: Click Remove link on test post
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog displayed asking 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?'

steps.expected: Post is removed from the feed
steps.actual: Post was successfully deleted and removed from the activity stream with slide-up animation

steps.action: As superuser (host), view activity stream with posts from other users
steps.expected: Remove link visible on other users' posts
steps.actual: Remove link visible on Test User12's badge notification post

steps.action: Click Remove link on another user's post
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog displayed with Yes/No buttons

steps.action: Click Yes to confirm moderator deletion
steps.actual: Post was successfully deleted - Test User12's badge post removed from feed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify deleted post is removed from feed

steps.action: After deleting a post, verify feed updates
steps.expected: Deleted post no longer appears in the activity stream
steps.actual: Deleted posts were immediately removed from the feed without page refresh

steps.expected: Remaining posts display in correct order
steps.actual: Next post in feed became the first visible post after deletion

steps.action: Click Comment link on a post to open comment form
steps.actual: Comment input area with Reply and Cancel buttons appeared

steps.action: Type a test comment and click Reply
steps.expected: Comment is added to the post
steps.actual: Comment 'Test comment for deletion test' was successfully added and displayed under the post

steps.action: Click Remove link on the post that has the comment
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog displayed asking to delete the item

steps.action: Click Yes to confirm deletion of post with comment
steps.expected: Post and its comment are both deleted
steps.actual: Post was deleted along with its comment - both removed from the feed

observations: The UI only uses SoftDelete API - there is no permanent delete option exposed in the Activity Stream UI. The permanent Delete API exists in the code but is not accessible from the user interface.
Delete confirmation uses dnnConfirm dialog with Yes/No buttons and 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' message.
Posts are removed from the feed immediately with a slideUp animation effect without requiring page refresh.
Deleting a post also removes all associated comments - they are deleted together as a unit.
Moderators (users with CanModerate permission) and superusers can delete posts from any user.
The Share input at top of page uses the same contenteditable pattern as comment inputs, which can cause confusion when trying to interact with specific input fields.
